data.title: CHF 2025,15th China Horse Fair 2025,Shanghai
data.meta_description: The most international and comprehensive event for trade professionals and enthusiasts active in China’s rapidly growing horse sports and leisure industries.
data.text:
CHF – a brand you can trust!

Since its launch in 2007 China Horse Fair (CHF) has grown and developed alongside the country’s professional equestrian, horse sports and leisure industry which it so successfully serves. As the country’s No.1 equine trade show, CHF consistently attracts the country’s top buyers and specifiers as they look to invest in the latest goods and services to meet their future needs.

CHF Beijing 2024 will be the 15th edition and will once again be a focal point for professional trade buyers and private enthusiasts located in the Northern and central provinces of China.

CHF Shanghai 2025 will be the 16th edition and will mainly attract buyers from the Southern provinces and Hong Kong SAR.

Over its previous 14 editions, CHF has hosted hundreds of suppliers from around the world including companies Australia, Belgium, UK, France, Germany, Holland, Ireland, Italy, United States, South America, Scandinavia, Singapore and China. It has also welcomed thousands of trade visitors and specifiers coming from across the length and breadth of China.

Both established industry brands and new to market companies will profit from exhibiting at CHF Beijing 2024 and CHF Shanghai 2025 as they put their latest products and services directly in front of China’s top professional and amateur buyers. There is no more efficient way to meet with and influence future purchasing decisions of existing and new customers.

Here are just some of the Cities/Provinces previous visitors came from:

Shanghai, Beijing, Tianjin, Wuhan, Chengdu, Shandong, Hebei, Inner Mongolia, Zhejiang, Jiangsu, Guangdong…and more etc.

Top buyers make sure they attend CHF – representatives from the country’s major riding facilities come to view and compare the latest products and services including: Beijing Equuleus International Riding Club, Beijing Tang Ren Polo Club, Beijing San Fu Stud Farm, Beijing Ou Zhu Bo Le Arabian Horse Stud Farm, Beijing Guo Fa Equestrian Club, Inner Mongolia Tian Bian Stud Farm, Shenyang Pony Club, Tangshan Wan Jun Equestrian Club, Hebei He Shun Stud Farm, Xinjiang Jun Bao Equestrian Club, Chengdu Da Gen Si Equestrian Club, Suzhou Shi Qi Jia Riding Club, Wuhan Han Ma Hui Riding School, and Japan Grand Pony Club…along with many others.

CHF Beijing 2024 will take place in Beijing one of China’s most established and important equestrian hubs while CHF Shanghai 2025 will give suppliers direct access to one of the country’s major growth hot spots and delivering an audience of new buyers, specifiers and enthusiasts.

Don’t delay! Space is limited and demand will be high so contact one of our friendly and helpful team today to discuss how we can make your participation a success.
